Ingredients.3: 10 slices jarred jalapeno peppers, chopped - or more to taste

Ingredients.7: 48  scoop-style tortilla chips (such as Tostitos® Scoops®)

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.

Directions.2: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir shallots in the hot butter until softened, about 2 minutes. Stir jalapeno peppers into shallots and cook until fragrant, about 2 more minutes. Stir cranberry jelly into the shallots and peppers until melted.

Directions.3: Mix shredded turkey with jalapeno-cranberry jelly mixture in a bowl until thoroughly combined. Arrange tortilla chips on the prepared baking sheet and fill each chip with 1 tablespoon turkey mix. Top each chip with 1/2 teaspoon of white Cheddar cheese.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese topping is melted and the chips are golden, about 10 minutes.
